>>Which of the following are fruits?||Select all that apply. There may be more than one correct answer.<<
[x] Apple [ ] Potato [ ] Broccoli [x] Banana
||A fruit is the fertilized ovary from a flower.|| ||A fruit contains seeds of the plant.|| ||An apple contains seeds of the plant.|| ||You probably don't think of them as having seeds, but Bananas have seeds in the fleshy part||

choiceresponse.label: Which of the following are fruits?
